Room.Name: Yellow Marsh Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Yellow Marsh Road, between the Avatar Ruins and the river Othax.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road is the mysterious Avatar Ruins, where it has been said that the ancient avatars of the gods fought great battles throughout the land, creating massive mountains, the oceans and much of the features of the land. The strange structures in the Avatar Ruins are said to be some of these remains.
